name: Dungeon Trader
description:
This is a love-hate tribute to all those games that don't give you enough bag space.

This dungeon is full of junk! 

Sift through the bones and boots to find the items your party needs to survive.

Click the items that monsters drop to bring them into your inventory and find out what they are. 

Trade unwanted items with the merchant while you make sure your knight is armoured and your archer has enough arrows.  The merchant is very  generous... perhaps too generous.

Keep your party healed, cured, and revived all while making sure you have enough free slots in your bag.

Controls

Click / Tap items in the top screen to place them in your inventory.

Drag items out to give to party members.

Items

- Arrows and Shields are for your party.

- Potions cure ailments or heal lost health.

- Hearts bring the dead back to life.

- Junk is junk, and there is so much junk. Get rid of the junk!

Dungeon Trader is a Ludum Dare 42 Jam
